question: 英会話
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>English</kanji> <kanji>meet</kanji>ing and <kanji>talk</kanji>ing with each other. This is <vocabulary>English Conversation</vocabulary>. This is used a lot when talking about "speaking in English" for studying English and whatnot.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
